text:
1 This information supports the information needs of financial market participants subject to Regulation (EU) 2019/2088 because
it is derived from additional indicators related to principal adverse impacts as set out by indicator #13 in Table III of
Annex I of Commission Delegated Regulation (EU) 2022/1288 with regard to disclosure rules on sustainable investments
(“Operations and suppliers at significant risk of incidents of forced or compulsory labour”).
